Title: Team Manager
Description:
Job responsibilities

THE LOUIS VUITTON PROMISE

“Whoever you are, whatever the purpose of your visit, I will cherish our time together. I will dare to discover who you are and encourage you to be true to yourself. You will trust me as your personal advisor. We will build a genuine relationship over time. Every time you come to Louis Vuitton, you will leave feeling enriched!”

OVERALL MISSION

As a Team Manager, you will be an ambassador of the Brand. You will take ownership to lead and coach your team, build

Client relationships, proactively foster the achievement of sales goals and ensure that the highest level of Client experience is

delivered. You will be responsible to recruit and build highly motivated teams, develop them to the next level and secure

succession plans. You will represent the Brand values and demonstrate the Louis Vuitton attitudes toward Clients and team

members.

Main Responsibilities

Ensure achievement of team objectives on monthly and annual basis

Team Management and Development


Support your team with consistent coaching, identify their development and training needs, partner with the Field Coach Trainer to tailor individual development plans.
Identify, recruit and develop talents, secure succession plans in collaboration with the Store Manager.
Set individual and team goals; proactively assess and manage performance.
Manage and motivate the team to drive business: create a positive and harmonious work environment, foster cooperation within the team and between managers.


Client and Business Development


Support the team in building long term Client relationship, leveraging the different clienteling tools to to ensure the highest level of Client experience
Put in place action plans to boost business and maximize product performance, leveraging visual merchandising, clienteling, training and team animation.
Proactively provide the Country office with product recommendations and qualitative feedback based on local knowledge about the market and Client needs, leveraging expertise and knowledge within the team.


Floor Management and Operations


Act as a role model demonstrating sales leadership to the team, support them with their own sales, building and developing your own Client portfolio at the same time.
Ensure business opportunities are maximized through efficient sales floor management, being a visible presence and support and ensuring the Louis Vuitton Promise standards are achieved.
Ensure policies are respected and support the team in all the daily operations tasks.


Profile

Expected Attitudes & Skills


Strong communication and listening skills
Proactive leadership style
Excellent client development skills
Business acumen
Strong organizational skills
Agility and resilience
Proficient in Italian and English

Reference LVM26083

Title: Senior (Applied) Data Scientist
Description:
About PriceHubble

PriceHubble is on a mission to transform how real estate and financial professionals make decisions. We're a fast-growing European B2B SaaS company that leverages the power of AI and big data to bring next-level transparency and insight to the property market. Our digital solutions empower clients across the real estate value chain - from banks to asset managers - with the most precise property valuations and forward-looking market intelligence. Already live in 11 markets across Europe, Asia, and North America, and backed by a team of 200+ forward-thinkers, PriceHubble is scaling fast and going global.

The opportunity

At PriceHubble, we organize our teams into Tribes. Each Tribe is responsible for a specific part of our product. They identify customer needs, create solutions, and ensure everything runs smoothly. Each Tribe operates independently, managing all aspects of its area. Engineers rotate between project teams and a group focused on maintenance and technical improvements.

The Property Intelligence Tribe provides insights to make informed real estate decisions. This includes assessing property values, tracking market trends, evaluating investment opportunities, and improving property management. Our mission is to deliver accurate property information for every residential property in our areas of operation. In that, Tribe members create the unique insights and intellectual property that drive our products.

The Tribe is a distributed team of engineers from 6 nationalities, located in 5 different European countries.

As an applied Senior Data Scientist, you will work on the ML systems that drive the core services of our platform. You will design, implement, and maintain Automated Valuation Models (AVMs) that professionals trust for assessing residential property values.

The impact you will have


Develop product features that directly drive revenue growth. Our valuation models are major selling points for our customers
Navigate cost-value trade-offs to make decisions that deliver value to customers at an appropriate cost
Implement solutions that work well in over 10 countries, while considering local specifics in your model
Lead a project from concept to launch, working with a temporary team of engineers
Raise the bar and drive the team to deliver high-quality products, services, and processes
Improve the performance and cost-efficiency of our ML models and pipelines at scale
Maintain and monitor the ML systems owned by your team


Requirements


A product-oriented mindset and enthusiasm for contributing to user-facing products. For you, ML is a means to an end - you're focused on delivering value to customers
Excellent English communication skills, both spoken and written, that allow you to communicate effectively with cross-functional partners and mentor fellow engineers. In our distributed team setup, strong writing communication skills are essential
Hands-on, you value writing clear, simple, and maintainable code. You understand that code is read more often than it is written
You embrace a growth mindset. You always continue learning and always seek new challenges.
Over 3 years of industry experience applying machine learning to solve business problems and writing production ML pipelines
AI fluency. You use AI tools daily in your development workflow. You understand what works and what doesn't, and you know how to get better results faster


Bonus


Previous experience in PropTech
Proficient in working with geospatial data and leveraging geospatial features


We're actively seeking applications from candidates of all backgrounds.

Benefits

Join an ambitious and hungry team and enjoy the following benefits:

💰 Competitive salary because we always want to attract the best talents.

📘 Learning & Development program - We want you to feel happy, confident about improving your skills, experience level as well as your personal development success.

🏢 Very well-located offices with a great remote work policy and the possibility to work from different places.

🕓 Flexible working hours and work life balance.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist Internship- L 68/99
Description:
Cerved è la Tech Company che aiuta imprese e istituzioni a proteggersi dal rischio e a crescere in maniera sostenibile.

Siamo leader nell'ambito dei prodotti e servizi integrati di Risk, Sales e Marketing Intelligence, Credit Management. Con Cerved Rating Agency siamo specializzati nella valutazione del merito di credito di imprese non finanziarie e registrati quale agenzia di rating europea.

Dal 2021, Cerved è entrata in ION Group, uno dei più grandi operatori FinTech sul mercato a livello internazionale in cui lavorano oltre 13 mila persone, con 60 sedi internazionali e oltre 4800 clienti in tutto il mondo insieme realizziamo soluzioni integrate per aiutare le imprese a prendere decisioni efficaci, semplificando i processi e mettendo al centro le persone. 

Sei una persona appassionata di dati e desideri far parte della trasformazione algo-driven in CERVED? Siamo alla ricerca di una figura di Junior Data Scientist che si unisca al nostro team di Collection Intelligence. Questa è un'opportunità sfidante per chi desidera contribuire alla comprensione dei dati e all'estrazione di insight significativi per il nostro business.

La persona che cerchiamo si occuperà di


Collaborare con il Collection Intelligence Manager per sviluppare metodologie e tecniche per l'analisi e la valutazione dei dati mediante modelli matematici e statistici.
Identificare, analizzare e interpretare i dati per individuare trend, pattern e opportunità di ottimizzazione dei processi aziendali.
Supportare le diverse aree aziendali nell'implementazione di strategie data/algo-driven sui sistemi gestionali aziendali.
Sviluppare reportistica per il monitoraggio dei principali KPI aziendali nell'ambito delle operazioni.


La persona che cerchiamo


Ha conseguito una laurea in Statistica, Matematica, Informatica o campo correlato.
Possiede forti doti analitiche e quantitative.
E’ in grado di organizzare, analizzare e interpretare quantità significative di informazioni con attenzione ai dettagli.
Ha competenze in data modeling
Ha una conoscenza avanzata di Excel
Utilizza il linguaggio di programmazione Python.


Per Cerved la diversità e l'inclusione sono valori fondamentali per permettere a tutti di esprimersi al meglio nell'ambiente lavorativo. Ci impegniamo tutti i giorni a capire, comprendere e sviluppare le potenzialità e a valorizzare la diversità delle nostre persone, che rappresentano il vero valore del nostro Gruppo.

Si valuta come sede di lavoro preferenziale San Donato Milanese (MI)


Show more

  • Utilizza il linguaggio di programmazione Python.

Per Cerved la diversità e l'inclusione sono valori fondamentali per permettere a tutti di esprimersi al meglio nell'ambiente lavorativo. Ci impegniamo tutti i giorni a capire, comprendere e sviluppare le potenzialità e a valorizzare la diversità delle nostre persone, che rappresentano il vero valore del nostro Gruppo.

Si valuta come sede di lavoro preferenziale San Donato Milanese (MI)

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
MEET FIDES




Fides è una tech company che da vent’anni si contraddistingue sul mercato per una doppia offerta di servizio: partnership consulenziali con i più importanti system integrator internazionali e sviluppo di progetti IT custom.




Grazie a 20 anni di esperienza e oltre 300 risorse dislocate tra le sedi (Milano, Napoli, Roma e Torino), Fides si posiziona tra le principali aziende italiane Hi-tech.




Le competenze e i progetti Fides si estendono dal Banking & Finance, al Digital Retail, alle tecnologie per il Monitoraggio Ambientale, ai Servizi e Soluzioni ICT per l’Industry 4.0, per l’e-commerce e la logistica.




JOB OPPORTUNITY




Per un progetto ad alto contenuto tecnologico, stiamo cercando un AI Engineer con una solida esperienza in Python e Large Language Models (LLM), da inserire in un contesto di sviluppo e ottimizzazione di soluzioni avanzate di AI generativa.




In questo ruolo, contribuirai all’addestramento, fine tuning e integrazione di LLM, sia locali (per garantire data sovereignty, sicurezza e conformità normativa in contesti altamente regolamentati) sia non locali, in base alle esigenze specifiche dei progetti. Le soluzioni saranno sviluppate su misura per i clienti, attraverso pipeline intelligenti e scalabili, perfettamente in linea con le evoluzioni più recenti dell’Intelligenza Artificiale.




TECHNICAL SKILLS




Buona conoscenza del linguaggio Python
Esperienza nell’utilizzo di LLM e AI generativa
Conoscenza (anche teorica) di tecniche di fine tuning di modelli
Familiarità con strumenti e framework come PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers
Utilizzo di strumenti per l’ottimizzazione e l’addestramento dei modelli (unsloth, deepspeed, LoRA, QLoRA, ecc.)
Conoscenze in ambito AI non generativa (costituisce un plus)
Interesse per le tecnologie emergenti e capacità di problem solving
Gradita esperienza con piattaforme cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Conoscenze generali di Java e familiarità con lo sviluppo di backend tramite framework quali Spring/Spring Boot (nice to have)
Esperienza (anche base) nella progettazione di soluzioni cloud-native e architetture distribuite (nice to have)




HUMAN SKILLS




Ottime doti comunicative e di problem solving
Predisposizione al lavoro in team
Conoscenza della lingua inglese
Proattività e orientamento al risultato




WHY FIDES




Hybrid work
Buoni pasto e welfare contrattuale
Assicurazione sanitaria aggiuntiva
Feedback continuo orientato alla crescita
Ambiente di lavoro giovane e innovativo




HUMAN-CENTRIC COMPANY




Il nostro asset più importante sono le persone e lavoriamo ogni giorno per migliorare il work-life balance delle nostre risorse. Fiducia, feedback e collaborazione sono valori strettamente connessi alla nostra idea di leadership e che rientrano nelle relazioni con le nostre persone e i nostri clienti e partner.




Livello e inquadramento saranno commisurati all'effettiva esperienza maturata.




Crediamo nei valori della diversità e dell’inclusione di genere e cultura prestando inoltre attenzione e sensibilità ai/alle candidati/e appartenenti alle categorie protette, ai sensi degli articoli 1 e 18 della legge 68 del ‘99.I dati personali saranno trattati in conformità alle disposizioni contenute nel regolamento UE 2016/679.

Show more

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist




Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?




Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.




RESPONSIBILITIES:




● Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data in banking and insurance, identifying useful patterns and insights to support business processes and decisions.

● Design, develop and implement advanced machine learning, data mining and statistical models to solve complex problems in finance.

● Collaborate in cross-functional teams to define project requirements and propose innovative solutions.

● Contribute to the development of proprietary frameworks and algorithms to improve the performance of solutions offered to our clients.

● Present complex results to technical and non-technical stakeholders, making analysis results understandable.

● Support customers in implementing solutions, ensuring knowledge transfer and customization.




REQUIREMENTS:




● Experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration and feature extraction.

● Excellent knowledge of Python and the most important analytical libraries.

● Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms

● Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, predictive modeling with the application of Machine Learning models, and data analysis.

● Ability to creatively solve complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

● Ability to rapidly prototype ideas/solutions with a critical/experimental approach to data analysis.

● Good communication skills and ability to translate technical results into insights for non-experts.

● Aptitude for teamwork, with strong orientation toward interdisciplinary collaboration.

● At least one year of working experience in applied ML projects.




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

● Master's degree or PhD with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields




NICE TO HAVE:

● Experience with code versioning systems (git).

● Experience in Pyspark development and working in big data platforms.

● Knowledge of at least one major cloud environment (Azure, GCP, AWS).

● Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision)




SOFT SKILLS:

A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.
A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.







LOCATION:

Milan




WHAT WE OFFER:

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 – we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of people and their continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Transparent discussions between managers and team members are set up within the projects, where reciprocal and timely feedback is exchanged. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the development trajectory of the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means ongoing training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. Particular attention is paid to younger colleagues, who are the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important, through immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees, and you recommend a person who is later recruited, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

Through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia, we have completely digitalized and integrated the management of our physical and virtual environments. Access to the office, smart working, workstations, meeting rooms, car pooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is extremely diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations that are directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities with which we actively collaborate, are stakeholders representing a great value for us, in terms of trust and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the selection phase to everyday life, also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and unicities.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, the territories and the communities in which we operate. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards that recognizes the performance of the building in terms of energy and water savings, reduction of CO2 emissions, improvement of the ecological quality of the interior, materials and resources used. In the Sustainability Report we report the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda that, drafted by the United Nations in 2016, we have been supporting since 2020.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Prestatech

At Prestatech, we're redefining the financial world by fostering innovation and challenging the traditional banking system. Our culture is diverse, dynamic, and forward-thinking. From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.

Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.

When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.

We’re a young and fast-growing company—but this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.

We’re passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.

To date, we have raised €8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..

We’re now looking for a Senior Data Scientist, someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands-on, outcome-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.

You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:


selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques
processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis
deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis
implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies
design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.
collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science
own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful
leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results


Requirements:


6+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)
Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.
Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques
Proficient in Python, with hands-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases
Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code
Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus


Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don’t worry — if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we’d still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.

Benefits


Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact
A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level
Ticket Restaurant
Annual training budget to help you grow and develop
2 days per week of Smart Working (+ 3 days at the office)
Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work
Bi-annual company offsites
a co-working office in one of the best district of Milan (Isola)


Recruitment Process:


HR Interview (30 minutes)
CTO Interview (45 minutes)
CEO Interview (30 minutes)


If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know — we’re happy to support you.

At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind — including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.

With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
Chi Siamo

Begear è una delle più importanti realtà italiane del mondo Tech e dei servizi ICT, partner dei principali player internazionali.

Siamo specializzati nella formazione e nella consulenza di persone che vogliono continuare la loro carriera nel mondo ICT e della Digital Business Transformation.







Cosa Cerchiamo

BeGear è alla ricerca di un AI Engineer - tra i 2 e i 4 anni di esperienza - da inserire nella nostra factory dedicata allo sviluppo di prodotti software fortemente orientati all'ingegnerizzazione.

Il team si divide tra il nostro Headquarter di Napoli e di Milano e l'attività verrà gestita in ibrido.







Requisiti

Eccellente padronanza di Python 3.12
Solida esperienza con LangChain, OpenAI SDK, PyTorch
Esperienza nel Prompt Engineering
Conoscenza dei servizi AWS ML, in particolare: Bedrock, SageMaker, Rekognition
Competenza nell’uso di Pytest, con focus su mocking e dependency injection
Familiarità con la gestione delle dipendenze tramite pip e Poetry
Ottima conoscenza di Git e dei flussi standard di versionamento (merge request, branching strategy)
Esperienza nella creazione e gestione di pipeline CI/CD, preferibilmente con GitLab CI
Conoscenze di base nello sviluppo serverless con AWS Lambda




Soft Skills:

Capacità di lavorare in team cross-funzionali
Ottima comunicazione (scritta e parlata)
Attitudine al problem solving
Abitudine a lavorare per obiettivi con attenzione alla qualità del codice




Nice to have:

Esperienza con pipeline MLOps, in particolare con DVC
Competenze nella valutazione delle performance di LLM
Conoscenza della programmazione asincrona (es. code/topic, architettura event-driven)
Esperienza con architetture a microservizi




Altre Informazioni

Attività: Full time
Sede di lavoro: Milano o Napoli
Modalità: ibrida - richiesta, se necessaria, 1 presenza a settimana negli uffici di Milano
CCNL Metalmeccanico con inserimento a tempo indeterminato







Per candidarsi all'offerta invitiamo gli interessati ambosessi (L.903/77) e le persone appartenenti alle categorie protette (L. 68/99) ad inviare il proprio CV, specificando il consenso al trattamento dei dati personali, nel rispetto dei principi di protezione stabiliti dal Regolamento GDPR 2016/679.

Show more

  • Conoscenza della programmazione asincrona (es. code/topic, architettura event-driven)
  • Esperienza con architetture a microservizi


Altre Informazioni

  • Attività: Full time
  • Sede di lavoro: Milano o Napoli
  • Modalità: ibrida - richiesta, se necessaria, 1 presenza a settimana negli uffici di Milano
  • CCNL Metalmeccanico con inserimento a tempo indeterminato



Per candidarsi all'offerta invitiamo gli interessati ambosessi (L.903/77) e le persone appartenenti alle categorie protette (L. 68/99) ad inviare il proprio CV, specificando il consenso al trattamento dei dati personali, nel rispetto dei principi di protezione stabiliti dal Regolamento GDPR 2016/679.

Title: Ingegnere Ambientale
Description:
Adecco Italia

Consultant Adecco ricerca, per azienda cliente operante nel settore del trattamento delle acque, la figura di: Ingegnere Tecnico Commerciale In riferimento alla direzione tecnica e commerciale, la figura avra la responsabilita di sostenere le operazioni commerciali e tecniche. La risorsa sara inserita all'interno dell'ufficio commerciale in affiancamento, seguendo un periodo di formazione interna fino al raggiungimento della piena autonomia nel ruolo. Responsabilita Principali: - Analisi approfondita delle esigenze dei clienti e sviluppo di soluzioni tecniche e commerciali. - Elaborazione e presentazione di offerte di vendita, arricchite da una documentazione tecnica e commerciale. - Gestione attenta e strategica delle relazioni con i clienti, garantendo un servizio di consulenza ottimale per massimizzare la soddisfazione e la fidelizzazione. Requisiti e Competenze: - Laurea triennale/magistrale in Ingegneria Ambientale, Idraulica o Chimica. - Padronanza assoluta della lingua inglese. - Competenza avanzata nell'utilizzo del pacchetto Office e di AutoCAD 2D. - Precedente esperienza nel settore del trattamento delle acque e/o in ruoli analoghi sara considerata un prerequisito fondamentale. Competenze Ausiliarie (Plus): - Esperienza nel campo del trattamento delle acque. - Esperienza in ruoli analoghi. - Conoscenza della lingua francese. - Conoscenza di software per disegno 3D. Si offre un contratto diretto con l'azienda con inquadramento commisurato alla reale competenza del candidato/a Opportunita di crescita e sviluppo professionale. Disponibilita oraria: Full Time

Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
Stiamo cercando una figura professionale con un forte interesse per tematiche AI e ML, applicate su contesti di cyber security.




In questo ruolo ti occuperai di studiare, identificare e sviluppare automatismi basati su tecnologie AI, ML, LLM per supportare le attività del Cyber Defence Center di Communication Valley.




Cosa imparerai lavorando con noi?




Entrando a far parte del nostro team avrai l’opportunità di lavorare all’intersezione tra cyber security e intelligenza artificiale, contribuendo attivamente all’evoluzione dei nostri processi difensivi attraverso l’uso avanzato di Large Language Models (LLM) e tecnologie di Artificial Intelligence (AI). Collaborerai con professionisti specializzati nella sicurezza informatica e nell’automazione intelligente, studiando modelli LLM open source e proprietari per valutarne l’applicabilità in scenari reali.




Parteciperai al design e sviluppo di soluzioni AI-driven per il supporto all’analisi degli incidenti, alla classificazione degli alert, alla generazione automatica di report e all'ottimizzazione dei flussi del Cyber Defence Center. Imparerai a identificare use case ad alto impatto nei contesti di detection & response e a trasformarli in strumenti concreti, integrati nei nostri processi aziendali.




Il tuo ruolo all'interno del team




Studiare nuovi modelli LLM/AI professionali ed opensource.
Identificare all’interno dei processi di sicurezza esistenti all’interno dell’azienda punti di miglioramento integrando logiche basate su LLM/AI.
Design ed implementazione di automazioni per supporto ad attività di analisi degli incidenti di sicurezza.
Analizzare, progettare e integrare modelli AI/LLM in architetture applicative sicure, sia all’interno di sistemi aziendali esistenti che in applicazioni di terze parti
Definire policy, linee guida e best practice per il deployment sicuro di soluzioni AI in ambienti enterprise (cloud, on-prem o ibridi), contribuendo allo sviluppo delle competenze architetturali del team
Contribuire allo sviluppo e alla manutenzione di strumenti interni, script e ambienti di laboratorio.




Potresti entrare a far parte del nostro team se...




Hai una laurea triennale o magistrale in Informatica, Sicurezza Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria delle Telecomunicazioni con una votazione almeno pari a 102/110.
Hai esperienza nell’utilizzo ed implementazione di modelli LLM/AI all’interno di processi strutturati.
Conosci la lingua inglese (scritta e parlata).
Conoscenza in sviluppo e architettura software.
Hai esperienza con il linguaggio Python.
Possiedi un forte entusiasmo per le tematiche di cyber security e artificial intelligence.




Rappresenta un plus avere almeno una tra le competenze elencate di seguito:




Pubblicato su GitHub (o repository simili) dei progetti relativi ad Artificial Intelligence o Cyber Security Automation.
Competenze di base in security automation
Orchestrazione di modelli AI e deployment su cloud.




Inoltre devi essere dotato delle seguenti capacità non tecniche:




Forte desiderio di apprendere e crescere nel campo della cybersecurity e AI.
Efficaci capacità comunicative e di scrittura tecnica.
Curiosità costante su come funzionano i sistemi.
Attitudine alla risoluzione dei problemi e attenzione ai dettagli.
Adattabilità e capacità di lavorare in autonomia ed in team




Dove lavorerai




Verrai inserito in un team con base a Milano e smart working parziale.




Candidati ora!




Communication Valley Reply si impegna a promuovere la diversità e a creare un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, valorizzando l'unicità delle persone indipendentemente da età, genere, orientamento sessuale, religione, nazionalità, disabilità o qualsiasi altra caratteristica tutelata dalla Legge Italiana (L.68/99).

Inoltre, Reply si impegna a garantire un processo di selezione equo e accessibile: non esitare a farci sapere se hai bisogno di supporto durante l’iter.

Title: Gen AI engineer
Description:
Se sei alla ricerca di un ambiente dove condividere e valorizzare le tue idee ed esprimere al meglio la tua passione per la data science questa è la nostra proposta!

Per importanti progetti di Data Science presso primarie realtà del panorama IT con sede nella città di Milano, ma con la possibilità di svolgere l’attività anche in smart working.

Farai parte di un contesto dinamico e strutturato che predilige il lavoro in team ed avrai modo di interfacciarti con team internazionali.

Skills:


Forte competenza in Python
Esperienza pratica con PyTorch, TensorFlow o framework simili per costruire e addestrare modelli generativi
Generative Models: Esperienza con modelli come GPT-4, Llama, includendo fine-tuning e customizzazioni
Large Language Models: Esperienza nel fine-tuning, ottimizzazione e distribuzione di LLM
Sistemi RAG: Esperienza nella costruzione di sistemi di generazione aumentata da recupero per migliorare le capacità di IA generativa
Competenza nella distribuzione e gestione di modelli di IA generativa su piattaforme cloud come AWS, Azure o Google Cloud



Offriamo:


Contratto a tempo indeterminato;
Incentivi e bonus in base alla seniority e al raggiungimento di obiettivi professionali;
Assicurazione sanitaria integrativa ed infortunistica
Sviluppo tecnico e professionale

Title: Medical Science Liaison - Triveneto, Emilia-Romagna
Description:
About The Role

The MSL provides field-based medical/scientific expertise ensuring understanding of the disease area and Biogen’s products as appropriate. They are integral to building valued constructive partnerships with key stakeholders in the medical community and the healthcare system.

What You'll Do


Acts as a trusted and credible medical science discussion partner by engaging in scientific/medical exchange with HCPs/ stakeholders as appropriate (as per the Biogen Medical whitepaper). Depending upon local requirements and regulations, this may include:
Proactive or reactive focused communication/education within the product label (using non-promotional materials)
Proactive, broad discussion around relevant Disease Areas
Reactive, broader communication which may cover both approved and non-approved products and wider Disease Area literature (medical/scientific exchange)
Legitimate exchange of medical and scientific information during the development of a medicine for the purpose of information gathering from groups such as medical experts/thought leaders (e.g., presentations at symposia)
Exploring new agendas within the MSL community and gathering medical insights to inform MA activities, LCM and investigational compounds
Stays up to date with therapy advances, current research, medical scientific knowledge and detailed knowledge on Biogen products & relevant Disease Areas
May support Medical Research activities (link with GCDO functions e.g., CRCL), internal training and external education, e.g. may be involved in the support and coordination of clinical research activities
Appropriately interacts and collaborate with other internal functions
Provides expertise to HCPs and other stakeholders who wish to present data on Biogen disease areas and related products.


Who You Are

MSLs contribute to company success through both internal and external medical education and medical/scientific information exchange and support. MSLs utilize their medical/scientific expertise to gather medical insights and to support research/ data generation initiatives.

Qualifications


BSc; Advanced terminal degree preferred (MD, PhD, PharmD, DNP in medical specialty) or equivalent combination of experience and education
Desire Min 2+ years’ experience in one of the therapeutic areas Neurology, Immunology/Dermatology and/or Hematology from Medical Affairs (pharmaceutical industry or CRO) OR the pharmaceutical industry OR Medical studies
Desire Post-full-registration experience in hospital practice
Prior experience of clinical trials management and understanding of GCP
Understanding of health economics
Technical knowledge in Neurology, Immunology/Dermatology and/or Hematology
Proven expertise in working with and within local regulations and code of practice


Job Level: Management

Why Biogen?

We are a global team with a commitment to excellence, and a pioneering spirit. As a mid-sized biotechnology company, we provide the stability and resources of a well-established business while fostering an environment where individual contributions make a significant impact. Our team encompasses some of the most talented and passionate achievers who have unparalleled opportunities for learning, growth, and expanding their skills. Above all, we work together to deliver life-changing medicines, with every role playing a vital part in our mission. Caring Deeply. Achieving Excellence. Changing Lives.

At Biogen, we are committed to building on our culture of inclusion and belonging that reflects the communities where we operate and the patients we serve. We know that diverse backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives make us a stronger and more innovative company, and we are focused on building teams where every employee feels empowered and inspired. Read on to learn more about our DE&I efforts.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, marital status, race, color, national origin, ancestry, ethnicity, religion, age, veteran status, disability, genetic information or any other basis protected by federal, state or local law. Biogen is an E-Verify Employer in the United States.

Title: TECNICO DI LABORATORIO/BIOLOGO
Description:
L'IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele, struttura clinica-scientifica-universitaria di rilievo internazionale e di alta specializzazione per numerose aree patologiche, sta ricercando un tecnico di laboratorio/biologo/biotecnologo da inserire nella propria Unità di Urologia con sede nei laboratori di URI-Urological Research Institute. L’Istituto di ricerca URI viene fondato nel 2009; da allora svolge intensa e avanzata ricerca traslazionale volta a studiare fattori di rischio, eziopatogenesi, biologia e terapie innovative per molte patologie di area uro-andrologica, quali i tumori urologici, la calcolosi delle vie urinarie, le disfunzioni urologiche funzionali (incontinenza urinaria e ostruzione minzionale), l’infertilità di coppia da fattore maschile, le disfunzioni sessuali maschili, come pure problematiche urologiche pediatriche.

Attività principali:


gestione del nuovo laboratorio di Istologia della Biobanca di URI, con processazione dei tessuti solidi, con applicazione di svariate metodologie di ricerca e analisi
affiancamento del personale della Biobanca URI nella gestione e processazione dei campioni biologici provenienti dalla U.O. Urologia di IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele
interazione costante con il Centro di Risorse Biologiche (CRB) per il recupero dei materiali liquidi e solidi, e i relativi consensi dei pazienti
data entry nel Database Biobanca URI



Cosa non può mancare:


Laurea in Tecniche di Laboratorio Biomedico o in Scienze Biologiche/Biotecnologie o affini
autonomia nell’allestimento di preparati istologici (dalla fissazione all’inclusione in paraffina), nel taglio al microtomo o criostato e nelle colorazioni immunoistochimiche
buona conoscenza delle principali tecniche di preparazione dei campioni biologici (plasma, siero, PBMC, fissazione e congelamento tessuti, colture cellulari, ecc.)
buona capacità di lavorare in team, attitudine al problem-solving, competenze organizzative, precisione, spirito di iniziativa e flessibilità



Dettagli lavorativi:


Tipologia contrattuale: contratto di collaborazione
Durata: 12 mesi (rinnovabile annualmente)
Sede: IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele, via Olgettina, n. 60 - Milano



In IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele, centro di eccellenza di fama mondiale per le sue attività cliniche e scientifiche, crediamo che considerare la diversità e promuovere un ambiente aperto e inclusivo sia fondamentale per il nostro successo. Ci impegniamo a garantire pari opportunità di lavoro, basate sul merito, senza distinzione di età, religione, sesso, disabilità, condizioni mediche, orientamento sessuale, estrazione culturale e sociale, identità o espressione di genere, origine nazionale o etnica o qualsiasi altro status legalmente riconosciuto che abbia diritto alla protezione in base alle leggi vigenti. Offriamo condizioni stimolanti e riconoscimenti adeguati a un'organizzazione di ricerca competitiva a livello internazionale.
Show more

L’Istituto di ricerca URI viene fondato nel 2009; da allora svolge intensa e avanzata ricerca traslazionale volta a studiare fattori di rischio, eziopatogenesi, biologia e terapie innovative per molte patologie di area uro-andrologica, quali i tumori urologici, la calcolosi delle vie urinarie, le disfunzioni urologiche funzionali (incontinenza urinaria e ostruzione minzionale), l’infertilità di coppia da fattore maschile, le disfunzioni sessuali maschili, come pure problematiche urologiche pediatriche.

Attività principali:

  • gestione del nuovo laboratorio di Istologia della Biobanca di URI, con processazione dei tessuti solidi, con applicazione di svariate metodologie di ricerca e analisi
  • affiancamento del personale della Biobanca URI nella gestione e processazione dei campioni biologici provenienti dalla U.O. Urologia di IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele
  • interazione costante con il Centro di Risorse Biologiche (CRB) per il recupero dei materiali liquidi e solidi, e i relativi consensi dei pazienti
  • data entry nel Database Biobanca URI


Cosa non può mancare:

  • Laurea in Tecniche di Laboratorio Biomedico o in Scienze Biologiche/Biotecnologie o affini
  • autonomia nell’allestimento di preparati istologici (dalla fissazione all’inclusione in paraffina), nel taglio al microtomo o criostato e nelle colorazioni immunoistochimiche
  • buona conoscenza delle principali tecniche di preparazione dei campioni biologici (plasma, siero, PBMC, fissazione e congelamento tessuti, colture cellulari, ecc.)
  • buona capacità di lavorare in team, attitudine al problem-solving, competenze organizzative, precisione, spirito di iniziativa e flessibilità


Dettagli lavorativi:

  • Tipologia contrattuale: contratto di collaborazione
  • Durata: 12 mesi (rinnovabile annualmente)
  • Sede: IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele, via Olgettina, n. 60 - Milano


In IRCCS Ospedale San Raffaele, centro di eccellenza di fama mondiale per le sue attività cliniche e scientifiche, crediamo che considerare la diversità e promuovere un ambiente aperto e inclusivo sia fondamentale per il nostro successo. Ci impegniamo a garantire pari opportunità di lavoro, basate sul merito, senza distinzione di età, religione, sesso, disabilità, condizioni mediche, orientamento sessuale, estrazione culturale e sociale, identità o espressione di genere, origine nazionale o etnica o qualsiasi altro status legalmente riconosciuto che abbia diritto alla protezione in base alle leggi vigenti. Offriamo condizioni stimolanti e riconoscimenti adeguati a un'organizzazione di ricerca competitiva a livello internazionale.

Title: Tecnico di laboratorio biomedico - Ospedale Privato
HTML:
Page Personnel

Per Il Potenziamento Del Laboratorio Di Patologia Clinica, Siamo Alla Ricerca Di Un/una Tecnico Di Laboratorio Biomedico.Nello Specifico La Persona Si Occuperà Di

  • produrre i risultati diagnostici di laboratorio richiesti, utilizzando le corrette procedure analitiche, per consentire al medico una rapida interpretazione dei valori, finalizzata ad orientare o confermare il quesito diagnostico del medico curante;
  • predisporre le prestazioni di sua competenza nei diversi settori, in collaborazione diretta con il personale dirigente di laboratorio e i referenti operativi;
  • verificare la corrispondenza delle prestazioni erogate, in situazioni ordinarie e d'urgenza, agli indicatori e standard predefiniti dal responsabile di U.O. di laboratorio analisi;
  • eseguire le verifiche di funzionamento delle apparecchiature, applicando protocolli di manutenzione ordinaria e richiedendo gli interventi di manutenzione straordinaria;
  • contribuire alla programmazione ed organizzazione del lavoro nel laboratorio analisi, collaborando con il personale dirigente, alla definizione di procedure e protocolli di lavoro;
  • assicurare i controlli di qualità sulle prestazioni erogate e sulle apparecchiature utilizzate;
  • assicurare la riservatezza di tutte le informazioni relative al paziente;
  • curare la corretta, tempestiva, sistematica, completa ed accurata raccolta dei dati clinici e gestionali, avvalendosi dei sistemi informativi disponibili;
  • gestire correttamente i materiali di consumo.

Attività lavorativa su tre turni dal lunedì alla domenica con riposi alternati

La Persona Che Cerchiamo Ha i Seguenti Requisiti

  • laurea triennale in Tecniche di Laboratorio Biomedico;
  • ha una buona conoscenza delle principali tecniche di preparazione dei campioni biologici (plasma, siero, PBMC, congelamento tessuti ecc.);
  • ha un'ottima padronanza della lingua inglese;
  • buona conoscenza dei principali pacchetti informatici e di navigazione su Internet.

Importante Ospedale privato situato nell'Hinterland Sud di Milano

Contratto a tempo indeterminato AIOP

Settore: Altro

Ruolo: Altro

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Us

With over 85 million global active users and 2,5 million transactions per day, Klarna is on the way to becoming the world’s favorite way to shop. To help us get there, we’re assembling an unparalleled global talent team—accelerating individual careers, and disrupting entire industries. We’re looking for people ready to achieve the extraordinary and embrace our bold ambitions as we shape the future of payments and fintech. Will you join us?

What You'll Do


Validate and critique models across a wide range of applications (credit risk, marketing, fraud detection, forecasting, etc.)
Work closely with model developers to improve quality, transparency, and documentation
Build benchmarking models and design rigorous test methodologies
Influence model governance and help shape Klarna’s standards around model risk management


Requirements


Strong experience in building statistical and machine learning models
Solid foundational knowledge in mathematics and statistics
Proficiency in Python and SQL


Ideally, You Have


An academic background in Physics, ML, Data Science, Mathematics, or Biology
Prior experience as a Senior Data Scientist, ideally within a regulated environment or fintech context


Please include a CV in English.

Since 2005, Klarna has been on a mission to reimagine how consumers spend and save in their daily lives. We help people save time and money and reduce financial worry. With over 85 million global active users and 2.5 million transactions per day, our vision is a world where Klarna empowers everyone, everywhere, through seamless financial and commerce experiences—as a personalized, trusted assistant making financial empowerment effortless.

Over 575,000 global retail partners, including H&M, Saks, Sephora, Macys, IKEA, Expedia Group, and Nike have integrated Klarna's innovative technology to deliver a seamless shopping experience online and in-store.

Title: Junior SW Engineer & Data Scientist
Description:
HELIOSWITCH




HelioSwitch - Spin off Politecnico di Milano - offre servizi di previsione e gestione del dato ad attori del mercato elettrico.

L’attività core è lo sviluppo di algoritmi di machine learning per la previsione dei consumi nel mercato energetico italiano, e della produzione da fonti rinnovabili. Ad affiancare la nostra suite di algoritmi vi è un robusto sistema di data warehousing progettato per scalare sulle centinaia di miliardi di data entry, necessità causata dall’incremento sempre crescente della disponibilità di dati nel sistema elettrico Italiano.

HelioSwitch attualmente prevede il ~6% dei consumi nazionali con prestazioni stato dell’arte, ed è in continua espansione, non solo come numero di clienti, ma come i servizi offerti e competenze maturate.

Avrai l’opportunità di affrontare problemi stimolanti e complessi con strumenti avanzati, in un ambiente dinamico e informale in forte crescita, lavorando in autonomia, ma a stretto contatto con founder e soci, con ampie opportunità di formazione sia organica che strutturata.

HelioSwitch è stata costituita nel 2019, ed ha sede al PoliHub - l’Innovation Park & Startup Accelerator del Politecnico di Milano.




DI COSA TI OCCUPERAI




In HelioSwitch ti occuperai assieme a noi dell’intera filiera del dato e degli algoritmi che sviluppiamo, in particolare:

progettare e implementare pipeline ETL, e servizi di data visualization e dashboarding interattivo,
implementare e testare algoritmi di machine learning, principalmente per l’analisi di time-series di mercato elettrico e dati meteorologici, ma con uno scope in crescita continua,
progettare, ingegnerizzare, e manutenere i servizi cloud offerti, gestendo il deploy degli algoritmi testati, occupandosi della delivery e visualizzazione del dato, e della robustezza del sistema,
interfacciarsi con i clienti per comprendere come rispondere alle loro necessità in modo efficace con gli strumenti sviluppati.




REQUISITI




laurea in Ingegneria Informatica, Informatica, o domini simili,
1 anno di esperienza lavorativa in uno o più dei seguenti domini: Software Engineering, Data Engineering, Cloud Engineering.




COMPETENZE RICHIESTE




esperienza con Python ed in particolare delle librerie legate all’analisi e visualizzazione dei dati, e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib,
esperienza con  SQL,
esperienza nello sviluppo di software con competenze di OOP e conoscenza dei SW design pattern più comuni,
dimestichezza con git e fondamenti di DevOps,
dimestichezza con la statistica e l’analisi dei dati,
disponibilità a lavorare in ambienti Linux,
conoscenza della lingua italiana ed inglese.




COMPETENZE APPREZZATE




esperienza con il design e sviluppo di pipeline ETL,
esperienza nello sviluppo di modelli di machine learning, e.g. regressioni, problemi di classificazione, forecasting,
esperienza con framework Python di machine learning, e.g. LightGBM, TensorFlow,
esperienza con Google Cloud Platform, in particolare BigQuery, DataFlow, Cloud Functions, Cloud Run, Cloud Storage,
esperienza con framework di web development, e.g. React, Vue, Angular,
esperienza con Apache Beam per il calcolo distribuito,
basi di CI/CD,
esperienza nei mercati mercati energetici.




DETTAGLI OFFERTA 




La posizione aperta prevede un contratto full-time indeterminato CCNL Commercio, con una RAL nel range tra 33.000€ e 37.000€, in funzione delle competenze, con buoni pasto da 8€/giorno, anche per i giorni da remoto.

La posizione prevede lavoro ibrido, con 2 giorni settimanali nella nostra sede, al PoliHub, Milano, MI, in Via Durando 39.

Le persone interessate possono inviare la propria candidatura con autorizzazione ai sensi del Regolamento UE 2016/679 (GDPR). La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006 ed è aperta fornendo pari opportunità ad ogni candidatura.

Title: Consulente in ambito transizione energetica
Description:
Entra nel nostro mondo.
Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Sarai parte attiva della nostra practice Energy. Supportiamo sin dal nostro ingresso sul mercato i principali player di riferimento del settore energetico ma non solo. Aiutiamo i nostri clienti nella gestione e governance di progetti strategici, innovativi e di performance improvement, supportandoli anche nell’ottimizzazione di processi trasversali. Insieme a loro definiamo un’appropriata strategia tecnologica, accompagnandoli durante le fasi di progettazione e di implementazione. Grazie alle nostre competenze multidisciplinari, possiamo migliorare le loro operations, utilizzando metodologie di Task Automation o di Process Reengineering.

In ottica di rinforzo dell’organico, siamo alla ricerca di un/una:

Consulente in ambito transizione energetica

Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro Team? 

Di seguito puoi approfondire i requisiti e le caratteristiche della persona che stiamo cercando: 


Almeno un anno di esperienza presso primarie società di consulenza, aziende del settore energetico o enti di ricerca (Universitari e privati);
Competenze in ambito transizione energetica, nello specifico in ambito CCUS;
Esperienza pregressa in progetti in ambito strategy/operation nel settore energy, preferibilmente legati alla transizione energetica;
Padronanza degli applicativi MS Office;
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.


Sarai coinvolto/a nelle seguenti attività:


Seguirai progetti nell’ambito della transizione energetica, in particolare, definizione di scenari energetici, analisi di mercato, scouting/assessment di tecnologie nell’ambito del Carbon Capture Utilization and Storage.


Perchè Bip?

People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.

Challenging yourself
Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration
Troverai una policy che supporta il lavoro AGILE fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity & Inclusion 
Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro. Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi. Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.

Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.
Se dovessi identificare tu stesso/a ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Il presente annuncio si rivolge ai candidati di ambo i sessi (L. 903/77).

Il presente annuncio si rivolge ai candidati di ambo i sessi (L. 903/77).

Title: DISTRICT MANAGER - MILANO
Description:
La risorsa si occuperà di gestire un perimetro di strutture presenti nella città di Milano in ambito sociosanitario che, riportando direttamente al Responsabile Operativo di Area, avrà le seguenti responsabilità:


Supportare e fornire consulenza alle strutture produttive in merito ai processi operativi e agli strumenti di gestione;
Controllare la corretta applicazione delle procedure aziendali;
Monitorare i risultati economici e di servizio.



È richiesta pregressa esperienza nella gestione di strutture nel settore della ristorazione collettiva (in particolare segmento socio-sanitario).

Completano il profilo dinamismo, ottime doti organizzative, gestionali e relazionali, proattività e flessibilità.

Area di lavoro: Milano

Le ricerche sono rivolte a candidati di ambo i sessi ai sensi della L. 903/77 e L. 125/9.

CIRFOOD tratterà i dati in conformità alle disposizioni previste daI Regolamento (UE) 679/2016. L’informativa completa è disponibile a questo link: https://www.cirfood.com/it/privacy

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Are you looking to make a measurable impact for your clients with data science?

Ready to expand your skillset in different tools, methodologies, and across various industries?

Do you have an innate passion for business and entrepreneurial sense while having an interest in the technical aspects of the job?

🎯 What is your mission?

Help innovative companies thrive in turning their objectives into results, through smarter use of data.

✅ More concretely, what will you do day-to-day?

As a Data Scientist, you will play a vital role in the end-to-end delivery of our projects.

Therefore, you will work closely with stakeholders to:


Prioritize business requirements
Manage data collection
Analyze results
Provide reports
Model data
Interpret trends and patterns
Communicate the results and next steps effectively with clients


Our assignments include:


Data audit
Data preparation
Descriptive analysis
Modeling
Presenting the results


Senior Data Scientists supervise and coach junior Data Scientists in delivering their projects and on internal tasks. This guidance is to help junior Data Scientists acquire the business and technical skills to manage their projects quickly.

Requirements

👤 Do you recognize yourself?

🎓 Your Background


You have a master's in Management/Economics, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, Biology, or similar - There is no standard study background for data
You are fluent in English and either in Dutch OR French


💼 Your Professional Skills


You have good knowledge and demonstrable experience with ETL and statistical packages (SAS, SPSS, R, Python, Spark). Knowledge of programming languages such as Javascript, Spark, S, C is a plus.
You have technical expertise in data preparation, data models, data mining, and segmentation


🤓 Your Personal Skills


You have strong analytical skills to collect, organize, analyze, and interpret large amounts of data to underline the relevant information regarding a specific business objective
You have a problem-solving mindset; you take a pragmatic approach regarding data science and seek out the simple solution


⚠️ Must Have


You are eligible to work in Belgium and the European Union (please be aware that we do not offer relocation support)


🤗 You will be a great fit if -


You want to be among the first employees to help us shape our organization and grow in the future.
You have a natural care about work quality, showing a professional attitude and passion for service. You are proactive, autonomous, and like to take initiative
You can confidently interact and communicate at all levels, from the front-line staff to the executive team, with data experts and non-experts alike.
You are curious about new techniques and tools and strive always to keep learning


🙅‍♀️ Some signs this may not be the right fit -


If you don't like to interact with customers or do presentations from time to time. All our Data Scientists are client-facing.
If you are not comfortable working at the client's premises (on average 2-3 days a week) and from our offices in Brussels (on average 1-2 days a week)
If you don't have an entrepreneurial mindset and aren't ready to go the extra mile to deliver quality work or contribute to an organization's growth


Benefits

💜 Working at Agilytic

We aim at creating a work environment that allows you to do exceptional work, grow your skillset and, most importantly, be happy while doing it.

You may work on assignments anywhere in Belgium and neighboring countries like Luxembourg, France, the Netherlands, and the UK. You can expect to interact with IT/data specialists and business executives (marketing, process, customer care).

We believe that data is a means to an end and not an end in itself. We don't use cutting-edge techniques when not suited to the problem we need to solve. We adapt to what the client truly needs, even if it might look less appealing from a technical perspective. For instance, we won't train a neural network predicting marketing performance based on 1000 variables if a simple dashboard showing marketing efficiency across a few dimensions answers the customer's question. All our missions are about data, and so far, approximately 50% of them haven't required any machine learning.

Salary And Benefits


💰 Competitive remuneration package: We offer a competitive remuneration package, a cafeteria plan in which you can allocate your variable remuneration to your preferred advantages (extra days off, electronics... and cash of course)
🏋️ Training roadmap: We will draft together a training roadmap, taking into consideration our internal competencies as well as your interests
🤝 Supportive structure and transparency: What we don't have in scale (yet), we'll make it up with flexibility, support, and transparency. We will be there for you every step of the way, with individual coaching and career roadmapping
🧰 Modern tools: Tools are a means to an end. We want them to help you do your best work, not become a bottleneck. That's why you can expect up-to-date hardware and software tools so that you (hopefully) never have to swear at your computer
🥂 Oh, and a little bit of fun too: We take our work very seriously, but we're not afraid to laugh at ourselves. Life is too short
Show more

The role will be Hybrid, with a mix of office and client visits (expect 2-3 days per week)

Must be fluent in Dutch and English (speaking and written)

Hands-on coding to design and implement robust solutions
Present solutions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
Help businesses adapt in the rapidly changing world of AI, to transition to AI and data-driven organisations
Develop and implement data solutions, end-to-end




Key Experience:

Python coding
Machine Learning models
Strong communication and presentation skills in both Dutch and English




Bonus Experience:

Consultancy/IT Services background

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
B.E.S. (Business and Engineering Solutions) is looking for a Data Scientist to coordinate, define and execute the data activities in the automotive sector.







Your responsabilities :

You implement feature engineering techniques to extract main features from events, manoeuvres, and trips,
You support study of driver behaviour based on time series big data and aggregated demographics,
You support Link Driver Behaviour comprehensive groups with market and persona data,
You provide support in the application of data science methods in study cases,
You analyse customer survey data and market data,




Your profile :

You have a Master degree,
You are fluent in English (written and spoken), French is a real asset,
You have 1 year of experience (internship, apprenticeship) in data,
You are interested in working in a sector at the heart of innovation,
You have knowldege in Python,
You have experience with big data,
You can work autonomously.




What can you except as a B.E.S. consultant?




Great projects in Engineering and High Technologies through major players to develop your technical skills and hard skills
Knowledge sharing processes though our competences centers and experts' communities to grow your multi-sectorial knowledge
A strong development plan to improve your soft skills such as Leadership, Communication skills, Change & People management capabilities…
A full package made of gross salary on 13.92 months, lunch allowance, entertainment expenses, company car & fuel card, group insurances OR a VIE!
A friendly, lively working environment within a dynamic and motivated team !!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Nexeo Belgium is looking for a Medior/Senior Data Scientist – Generative AI to join the Artificial Intelligence Tribe of one of the top financial institutions in Belgium.




As part of the team, you will:

Design and develop AI applications (e.g., virtual assistants) to improve customer experience, empower employees, and optimize internal processes.
Apply a broad range of analytical methodologies, including Generative AI (Prompt Engineering, RAG, fine-tuning, speech-to-text, agentic applications, image generation/interpretation) and predictive AI techniques.
Leverage your expertise in Python to develop and deploy AI solutions in production using modern tools and frameworks.
Collaborate in an Agile environment with a multidisciplinary team, sharing expertise and driving innovation.
Access and analyze one of the most diverse and rich datasets in the market.
Present project outcomes directly to top management.

Your profile:

Master’s degree in a quantitative field (statistics, mathematics, engineering, or equivalent).
At least 3 years of relevant experience in Data Science and Analytics.
Strong expertise in Python, deep learning, and pre-trained models.
Experience with Generative AI frameworks (LangChain, Haystack, etc.) is a plus.
Previous experience with GenAI applications in the financial sector is an asset.
Fluent in Dutch or French, and fluent in English.
Business-oriented mindset, excellent communication skills, and ability to work in multicultural environments.
Proactive, autonomous, and able to learn quickly new techniques when needed.

Work location:

Hybrid model: 50% on-site / 50% homeworking.

We offer:

A competitive package.
The opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies on impactful business cases.
A collaborative environment fostering innovation and knowledge-sharing.

Ready to shape the future of AI in the financial sector?

Apply now and join Nexeo Belgium.

#AI #GenerativeAI #DataScience #MachineLearning #FinanceJobs #Consulting #Belgium #Python

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist – AI & Microsoft Services




Location: Brussels (Hybrid – 2 days onsite, 3 remote)

Start: ASAP | Type: Freelance




About the Role

We’re looking for a hands-on Data Scientist / AI Engineer to design and deliver impactful AI applications using Microsoft AI Services, Generative AI, and Copilot. You’ll take on diverse business challenges: from building virtual assistants to automating internal workflows, and turn them into production-ready solutions that enhance customer experiences, empower employees, and optimise processes.




This role is self-directed and innovation-focused. You’ll work with techniques such as Prompt Engineering, RAG, fine-tuning, speech-to-text, image generation & interpretation, and classical ML/statistical methods. You’ll collaborate closely with business stakeholders and technical teams, communicate results directly to leadership, and contribute to reusable AI frameworks in an Agile environment.




Key Responsibilities

Design and implement AI solutions using Microsoft AI ecosystem tools (Azure AI, Azure Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, Copilot)
Apply a mix of Generative AI and Predictive AI methods to real-world use cases
Build proof-of-concepts and evolve them into scalable, production-ready solutions in Python
Share insights with the team and help define AI best practices
Present results and recommendations to senior stakeholders




What You Bring

Strong Python and AI/ML development skills
Experience deploying AI applications into production
Knowledge of Generative AI techniques, with the ability to quickly learn new ones
Problem-solving mindset and ability to turn ideas into deliverables
Clear communicator, able to explain technical concepts to non-technical audiences
Languages: English + French or Dutch

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
We are currently looking for a “Data Scientist” to strengthen the Cronos Europa team.

This position requires a maximum of 5 days per month at client offices. However, teleworking must take place within 2 hours of Brussels.

Responsabilities


Coordination and review of policy units' business needs
Definition of solutions proposed for servicing policy units' business needs
Interaction with the business analysts, customer, users, project leaders and the developers
Carry out ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) tasks
Creating, designing and developing data models
Analyse large datasets and propose approaches for optimisation of reporting
Assessment and quality control of data
Preparation of statistical analysis of data for use by policy officers and other stakeholders
Management and processing of data
Reporting of key indicators for different policy fields on the basis of data sets available
Development and maintenance of interactive dashboards in Power BI
Assistance with data management aspects of IT projects developed


Technical skills


Data Analytics techniques and tools
Power BI (including Power Query)
Experience with one or more of the following: Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, Languages like Visual Basic, SQL, Other Business Intelligence tools (SAP Business Objects, QlikSense, SAS...), ETL processes and tools (i.e. Azure Data Factory...)
SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL)
Architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores
Knowledge in one of the following areas: predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems


Profile


Bachelor's degree minimum
English fluent
Ability to integrate in multicultural environment, team player, discretion, integrity, problem solving


Why cronos group?

We'll propose you


An attractive salary package
A good work-life balance environment
The assurance of working in cutting-edge technologies in an entrepreneurial spirit.
The opportunity to develop your skills thanks to tailor-made training courses according to your needs
A good job in a friendly place


If you wish to integrate a dynamic structure on a human scale while working with the latest technologies, don't wait anymore and join Cronos!

Title: Data Scientist (SNS02366)
Description:
Job Description

The Tribe Artificial Intelligence team is seeking a medior or senior Data Scientist with a minimum of 3 years’ experience and a proven track record in developing generative AI applications. As a Data Scientist, you will need to have expertise in various aspects of Machine Learning. This role offers the opportunity to apply and enhance your skills across multiple domains.


Tackle various business challenges by creating AI applications (virtual assistant, …) aimed at enhancing client experiences, empowering employees with superior tools, and automating and optimizing internal processes.
Utilize a range of analytical methodologies (generative AI and predictive AI), including GenAI techniques & methodologies : Prompt Engineering, RAG, Fine-tuning, speech-to-text, agentic applications, image generation and interpretation, and classical statistical/machine learning techniques. While we don’t expect you to be an expert in all areas, you should possess strong expertise in core technologies and the ability to learn new methods as required.
Demonstrate extensive experience in programming with Python and contribute to deploying AI applications in production using a comprehensive stack of tools.
Communicate the fruits of your work directly to the top management.
Access one of the richest volumes of varied data in the market and apply your skills to it.
Evolve in an environment where innovation and lean processes are praised, straight-forward communication is encouraged, and peers understand the meaning of team up.
Work with a team of colleagues in an Agile organization who are ready to collaborate and to share their experience.


Education

You have at least a Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline, such as statistics, mathematics or engineering.

Candidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial knowledge of analytics are also encouraged to apply.

You have at least 3 years of relevant experience in Data Science and Analytics.

Technical Experience


Python, deep learning and pre-trained models
Domino, git, genAI framework : langchain, haystack, …
Business experience
preferable
GenAI Application for Finance

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist

About Remobi:

We are Remobi - We empower businesses to scale, innovate, and achieve their goals through high-quality technical solutions delivered by high performing, high quality, REMOTE nearshore technology teams.




Join our Remobi community to have access to meaningful, innovative freelance projects and play a key role in shaping how companies operate!







Position Overview:

Location: Fully Remote

Role Type: Freelance/B2B/Contract

Duration: End of September 2025 (Possibility of a 1-year extension)







Position Summary:

We’re hiring a results-driven Data Scientist to build and deploy high-performance ML models across NLP, computer vision, and predictive analytics. You’ll work with modern cloud and data tools (AWS SageMaker, Snowflake, Aurora) to deliver real-time solutions, collaborating with technical teams while operating with autonomy and precision. This role suits someone highly analytical, technically sharp, and fluent in English.




Responsibilities:

Design, build, and refine machine learning models for real-world applications.
Analyse large datasets to extract patterns, trends, and actionable insights.
Collaborate with engineers and analysts to deploy scalable ML solutions.
Automate ML workflows using Snowflake and AWS SageMaker.
Present findings through clear reporting and data visualizations.
Stay current with evolving machine learning tools and techniques.







Qualifications:

Strong knowledge of ML algorithms (regression, decision trees, neural networks, etc.).
Hands-on experience with AWS SageMaker and Snowflake.
Proficiency in Python, SQL, and associated ML/data libraries.
Skilled in data visualization (preferably with Tableau).
Fluent English communicator (clear, technical, and to the point).
Background in real-time prediction systems, ideally using Aurora (Desirable)







If you are interested in this role or do have anybody in mind for this position, feel free to apply or get in touch

Title: 🤖 Junior Data Scientist (Brussels Based) 🇧🇪
Description:
Please note: The role is based out of our Brussels office. At the moment, we do not offer relocation, Visa sponsorship, or remote roles.




Apply to the role using this link https://www.sailpeak.com/apply




Applications via the “Easy Apply” button are not being monitored.




About SailPeak

At Sailpeak, we are a Brussels-based consulting firm specializing in guiding Banking & Insurance firms through the complexities of digital transformation.

With expertise in Business Strategy, Data & AI, and Digital Transformation, Sailpeak helps clients navigate the ever-evolving landscape and reach new heights of success.




🤖 About the Role

You will play a pivotal role in shaping digital strategies for top-tier banking clients. You’ll gain hands-on experience in data analysis, dashboard creation, and performance optimization, contributing to impactful insights in the banking sector. You will be busy exploring the latest machine-learning models.




📊 You will:

Assist in data collection, cleansing, and analysis from various banking sources to identify key insights.
Take a part in Machine Learning & Deep Learning Projects
Support the development of data-driven digital strategies and campaigns tailored to the banking industry.
Conduct basic A/B testing and assist in performance analysis of digital initiatives within the banking domain.
Create and maintain dashboards and reports specific to digital banking strategies.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize campaign targeting and segmentation within the banking sector.
Participate in data interpretation and contribute to actionable recommendations in the context of banking and digital transformation.




📊 You bring to the table:

A Master’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Banking, Digital Transformation, or a related field.
A strong eagerness to work with data and learn data analysis techniques within the banking sector.
Basic knowledge of data analysis tools such as Python, VBA, SQL, Power BI, or Tableau.
Familiarity with digital banking technologies and platforms is a plus.
An interest in digital strategy and a desire to grow in this field within the banking industry.
Strong communication skills to convey data findings in the context of banking and digital strategy.




🗣️ Language Skills

Fluency in English and French/Dutch




🤹 Other Skills

We are looking for proactive problem-solvers
You’ll be working independently & autonomously
Passion for growing, building, and continuous learning, especially around the developments within AI and Data Science
Working with cross-functional teams with different business needs, requirements, and challenges




🎁 What’s in it for you

💸 A competitive salary and benefits package.

🦾 Working on cutting-edge projects with leading banking clients, in a startup environment

💿 Exposure to a wide array of AI and data science technologies.

🫂 Mentorship from Directors and Partners with backgrounds from renowned companies like Google, PayPal, Semetis, and Sia Partners.




🧑‍🔬 The Process

Step 1: 30-minute call with our Head of Talent (Peter): focusing on your current situation, motivation, experience, and practicalities
Step 2: 30-minute call with one of our Founders (Stjepan or Nico): deep-dive into your experience
Step 3: Onsite Business Case with our team
Step 4: Offer!




Are you ready to embark on a rewarding career in management consulting with Sailpeak?
